title: X-Mcp-Server
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for integrating with X (Twitter), allowing reading timelines, posting tweets, and replying with rate limit handling.
creator: DataWhisker

TWITTER_API_KEY.description: The Twitter API Key (Consumer Key) for application authentication.

TWITTER_API_SECRET.description: The Twitter API Key Secret (Consumer Secret) for application authentication.

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: The Access Token for authenticating as the user.

TWITTER_ACCESS_SECRET.description: The Access Token Secret for authenticating as the user.
